message.content: This question requires an understanding of the concept of pollution and the potential effects of certain human activities. Option (A) is incorrect because using solar energy is actually a more environmentally friendly alternative to other forms of energy that can contribute to pollution. Options (C) and (D) are also incorrect because riding bikes and walking are forms of transportation that do not contribute to pollution.
